articles.content:
Preparatory Com. for DPRK Founding Anniv. Inaugurated in Democratic Congo 
    Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Democratic Congo national preparatory committee for the celebration of the 56th anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was held at the Workers' Civic Association on August 9 under the sponsorship of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association.
 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The committee set the days from August 9 to September 9 as the celebration period and discussed and decided on the organization of colorful functions in this period.

articles.content:
Commemorative Information Bulletin Issued in Democratic Congo 
    Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Information bulletin titled "DPRK Significantly Celebrating Its 56th Anniversary under the Banner of Songun" was issued on August 9 by the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association on the occasion.
 The bulletin dealt with the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by liberating the country and building the state and the feats leader Kim Jong Il has accomplished by dynamically pushing forward the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation , protecting the supreme interests of the country with his Songun leadership.    
 It referred in detail to the fact that the might of the DPRK is growing stronger than ever before and great progress is being made in the struggle to achieve reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.

Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Diplomatic Corps 
    Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the liberation of the country.
 The letter was handed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun Thursday by Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is doyen of the corps.
